dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the environmental footprints of wheat production

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Based on 126 studies conducted in China between 1996 and 2018, using meta-analysis in combination with decision regression tree modeling and life cycle assessment (LCA)
基于1996年至2018年在中国进行的126项研究，采用荟萃分析结合决策回归树建模和生命周期评估（LCA）

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: In addition, four regions, namely, Northwest (Gansu, Ningxia,Qinghai, Shaanxi, and Xinjiang provinces), North (Beijing, Jilin,Hebei, Heilongjiang, Inner Mongolia, Liaoning, Shanxi, andTianjin provinces), Center (Guangdong, Guangxi, Henan, Hubei,and Hunan provinces), and East (Anhui, Fujian, Jiangsu, Jiangxi,Shandong, Zhejiang, and Shanghai provinces), were assigned asZhang et al. (2017; Figure 1), while this classification excludedregions that have no studies

此外，西北地区（甘肃、宁夏、青海、陕西和新疆四省）、华北地区（北京、吉林、黑龙江、吉林和新疆四省）、西南地区（甘肃、宁夏、青海、陕西和新疆四省青海省、陕西省和新疆省）、华北地区（北京市、吉林省、河北省、黑龙江省、内蒙古河北、黑龙江、内蒙古、辽宁、山西和天津市）、中部（广东省、广西省、河南省、湖北省、湖南省和湖南省），以及东部（安徽、福建、江苏、江西、山东、浙江和上海省）、山东、浙江和上海等省），被分配为Zhang et al. (2017; 图 1)，而这一分类排除了没有研究的地区

technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical usage of the data pertains to the environmental assessment of wheat production processes across various regions in China. It evaluates the carbon emission factors and provides a regional analysis that can be valuable for agricultural policy-making, environmental impact reduction, and life cycle assessment (LCA) studies within the agricultural sector. It is relevant for stakeholders aiming to understand and mitigate the environmental footprint associated with wheat production.
该数据的技术用途涉及中国多个地区小麦生产过程的环境评估。它计算了碳排放因子并提供了区域分析，这对于农业政策制定、减少环境影响以及农业部门的生命周期评估（LCA）研究非常有价值。这适用于希望理解和减轻与小麦生产相关的环境足迹的各方利益相关者。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Literature and data selection criteria were similar to thoseused by Li et al. (2020; Supplementary Material). Ultimately,126 studies, including 1,020 yield, 437 WPc, and 82 NUEfpaired observations were included in this study
文献和数据选择标准与那些类似李等人使用。 （2020；补充材料）。最终，126 项研究，包括 1,020 项产量、437 项 WPc 和 82 项 NUEf本研究纳入了配对观察

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Li, Z. et al. Optimizing Wheat Yield, Water, and Nitrogen Use Efficiency With Water and Nitrogen Inputs in China: A Synthesis and Life Cycle Assessment. Frontiers in Plant Science 13, (2022).
Li, Z. et al. Optimizing Wheat Yield, Water, and Nitrogen Use Efficiency With Water and Nitrogen Inputs in China: A Synthesis and Life Cycle Assessment. Frontiers in Plant Science 13, (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should apply the data for LCA based on methodological consistency with the referenced studies. Take into consideration regional differences in wheat production as specified (Northwest, North, Center, and East China). Given that the data excludes regions without studies, users must not extrapolate findings to unrepresented areas. Attention must be paid to the years of the studies (1996-2018) when applying data to current or future scenarios. The provided classification by Zhang et al. (2017; Figure 1) should be adhered to, and it is equally important to verify that the literature and data sources align with the selection criteria used in this and similar works, such as those by Li et al. (2020; Supplementary Material).

用户应当基于方法学的一致性使用该数据进行LCA。应考虑如指定的小麦生产区域差异（西北、华北、中部和华东地区）。鉴于数据排除了没有研究的地区，用户不得将研究结果推广到未被代表的地区。在将数据应用到当前或未来的情景时，必须注意研究的年份（1996-2018年）。必须遵循张等人提供的分类（2017年；图1），同样重要的是验证文献和数据来源是否与本研究及类似工作中使用的选择标准相符，如李等人（2020年；补充材料）。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
